overview: Follow the life of an ordinary guy whose routine takes top priority amongst everything. He wears the same clothes to work everyday, he frequents the same cafe every single day of the week for his cup of coffee, sitting at the very same table every time. On one particular day, however, an unusual interruption to his routine brings about one of the biggest changes in his life. A change he is not necessarily prepared for, but a change he is ready to accept.
tagline: An ordinary man's unordinary love story.
title: A Bite of Optimism
